name: H.O.P.E. TD
description:
H.O.P.E
Help Our People Escape

https://forms.gle/JcHg3RH7Prh7zJjp9

controls: 

WASD -> movement for the drone

Q/E -> rotate camera left/right

Scroll up/down -> zoom in/out

B -> Toggle building mode

P -> Pause game

LMB -> interact

RMB -> deselect building mode

Story: 

An alien race is attacking a colony, you are the defending AI tasked with holding them off for as long as possible.

Strategically place the barricades so the enemy takes as long as possible to reach the base and gives you as much time as possible to take them down. 

Enemies will drop items which you can use on your barricades to improve your defenses
